sections.css:
$listing-items-padding: $line-height-computed/6

// Ordered/Unordered list
ul:not([class]),
ol:not([class])
  margin: 0 0 $paragraphs-margin
  li:not([class])
    padding: $listing-items-padding 0
    ul,
    ol
      margin: $listing-items-padding 0 0

// Unordered list
ul:not([class])
  padding-left: 0
  li:not([class])
    position: relative
    padding-left: 30px
    &:before
      content: "\2022"
      color: $brand-primary
      font-size: 1.5em
      position: absolute
      top: $listing-items-padding/3
      left: 0
    ul li:before
        content: "\25E6"
ul li
  list-style: none

//Ordered list
ol:not([class])
  -webkit-padding-start: 30px

// Description list
dl
  margin: 0 0 $paragraphs-margin
  dt,
  dd
    padding: $line-height-computed/6 0
  dt
    float: left
    clear: left
    width: 30%
  dd
    width: 70%
    margin-left: 30%

sections.description: Minimalistic, fully hackable form framework.
sections.css:
$form-item-width: 300px
$form-item-height: 40px
$form-item-margin: 30px
$form-item-font-size: $font-size-base
$form-item-bg: $gray-lighter

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.form


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__item
  margin: 0 0 $form-item-margin
  position: relative
  width: $form-item-width
  overflow: visible
  // Make form item full collumn width if is is composed in grid layout:
  *[class^="col-"] > &,
  *[class^="col-"] > .box > &
    min-width: auto


.form__label
  display: block
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-small
  text-transform: none
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold


.form__actions
  margin-top: $form-item-margin * 3
  button,
  input[type="button"],
  input[type="submit"]
    margin: 0


.form__input
  width: 100%
  margin: 0
  border: 2px solid transparent
  border-radius: 0
  height: $form-item-height
  line-height: $form-item-height - ($form-item-height/3)
  padding: $form-item-height/6 10px
  box-sizing: border-box
  font-size: $form-item-font-size
  transition: all 200ms ease-in
  background-color: $form-item-bg
  +placeholder($gray-light)
  &[type=file]
    line-height: $form-item-height * 0.45
textarea.form__input
  height: auto
select.form__input
  -webkit-appearance: none
  padding-right: 30px
  cursor: pointer
  // Custom caret:
  &:not([multiple])
    background:
      image: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 50%, $text-color 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, $text-color 50%, transparent 50%)
      position: calc(100% - 15px) $form-item-height/2-2px, calc(100% - 10px) $form-item-height/2-2px
      size: 5px 5px, 5px 5px
      repeat: no-repeat
  &[multiple]
    height: auto


.form__checkbox,
.form__radio
  display: block


.form__help
  position: absolute
  top: 100%
  display: block
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  line-height: $font-size-xsmall * 1.5
  color: lighten($text-color, 10%)


.form__addon
  position: absolute
  top: $line-height-computed
  right: $form-item-height / 3
  font-size: $form-item-font-size * 0.7
  line-height: $form-item-height


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__item--inline
  width: 100%
  .form__checkbox,
  .form__radio
    display: inline-block
    margin-right: 20px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__input:focus
  border: 2px solid $brand-primary
  box-shadow: none
  outline-width: 0


.form__item.is-success
  .form__label,
  .form__addon,
  .form__help
    color: darken($green, 5%)
  .form__input:not(:focus)
    border-color: lighten($green, 10%)
    // background-color: lighten($green, 53%)


.form__item.has-error
  .form__label,
  .form__addon,
  .form__help
    color: darken($red, 15%)
  .form__input:not(:focus)
    border-color: lighten($red, 15%)
    background-color: lighten($red, 53%)


//

sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item,
.timeline__legend
  display: table
  width: 100%

.timeline__legend
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed * 0.667

.timeline__time,
.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-time,
.timeline__legend-text,
  display: table-cell

.timeline__time,
.timeline__legend-time
  width: 70px
  padding: 0 20px 0 0
  text-align: left
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    width: 125px
    text-align: right
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 40px 0 0


.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-text
  padding: 0 0 0 20px
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 0 0 40px

.timeline__text
  border-left: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  position: relative
  &:before
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 20px
    height: 20px
    position: absolute
    top: 1px
    left: -10px
    background-color: $brand-primary
    border: 6px #fff solid
    border-radius: 50%

.timeline__title
  font-size: $font-size-large
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  margin: 0
  text-transform: uppercase

.timeline__description
  width: 100%
  padding-bottom: 20px
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  margin-bottom: 20px
  p
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 3
    &:last-child
      margin: 0

// Last item styling
.timeline__item:last-of-type
  .timeline__text
    border: none
  .timeline__description
    border: none
    padding: 0


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item--past
  &, .timeline__title
    color: $gray-light
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $gray-light

.timeline__item--now
  .timeline__time
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $yellow

sections.description: Accordion switched by pure CSS basing on radio inputs, inspired by http://youmightnotneedjs.com/#tabs. Works with up to 7 elements.
sections.markup:
Content for the first accordion

Content for the second accordion

Content for the third accordion
sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
// .accordion

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.accordion__input
  // Visually hide radio buttons
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.accordion__label
  position: relative
  display: block
  cursor: pointer
  margin: 0 0 1px
  background: $gray-light
  color: white
  padding: 3px 40px 3px 10px
  overflow: hidden
  &::after
    content: '+'
    position: absolute
    display: block
    top: 0
    right: 0
    height: 100%
    width: 30px
    padding: 3px 0
    text-align: center
  &:checked
    content: '-'

.accordion__content
  height: 0
  opacity: 0
  transition: 500ms opacity ease-in-out

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
// Open content when clicking label.
#accordion-toggle-1:checked ~ #accordion-content-1,
#accordion-toggle-2:checked ~ #accordion-content-2,
#accordion-toggle-3:checked ~ #accordion-content-3,
#accordion-toggle-4:checked ~ #accordion-content-4,
#accordion-toggle-4:checked ~ #accordion-content-5,
#accordion-toggle-4:checked ~ #accordion-content-6,
#accordion-toggle-4:checked ~ #accordion-content-7
  height: auto
  opacity: 1
  padding: 20px 10px 0

// Change symbol on label.
.accordion__input:checked + .accordion__label
  &::after
    content: '-'

sections.description: Button in various color and size versions.
sections.markup: Button
sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn
  background: transparent
  padding: 11px 25px
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  font-size: $font-size-base
  letter-spacing: 0.05em
  border: 2px solid
  border-radius: 30px
  white-space: nowrap
  cursor: pointer
  display: inline-block
  width: auto
  height: auto
  box-sizing: border-box
  +btn-color($text-color)
  &:hover, &:focus
    transition: color 250ms, border-color 250ms, background 250ms
    +btn-color(#fff, $text-color, $text-color)

button,
input[type="button"],
input[type="submit"]
  @extend .btn
  margin-top: 30px


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn--block
  width: 100%
  display: block
  max-width: none
  text-align: center

.btn--xs
  padding: 3px 10px 4px

.btn--sm
  padding: 7px 20px 9px

.btn--lg
  padding: 15px 35px
  border-radius: 30px

.btn--circle
  width: 48px
  height: 48px
  line-height: 48px
  padding: 0
  margin: -14px 0
  display: inline-block
  text-align: center
  border-radius: 50%
  +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color(#fff, $gray-base, $gray-base)

.btn--light
  +btn-color(#fff, #fff)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--primary
  +btn-color(#fff, $brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--link
  border: none
  padding-left: 0
  padding-right: 0
  +btn-color($brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    text-decoration: underline

.btn--disabled
  opacity: 0.15
  cursor: not-allowed
sections.renderMarkup: Button

sections.description:
Widget whith date and circular diagram how much time is left. Based on example http://codepen.io/rendro/pen/qazCG. Informations are shown horizontally or vertically to not take up unnecessary space on mobile devices depending on width of wrapping element. sections.description: Dropdown menu switched by pure CSS. No jQuery.
sections.markup: First dropdown link Second dropdown link Third dropdown link
sections.css:
$dropdown-max-width: 230px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.dropdown
  position: relative
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.dropdown__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.dropdown__inner
  position: absolute !important
  top: 100%
  left: 0
  right: 0
  margin-top: 15px
  max-width: $dropdown-max-width
  padding: 5px 20px 10px
  display: none
  overflow: hidden
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  text-align: left
  text-transform: none
  line-height: $line-height-computed
  color: $text-color
  z-index: 101
  border: 1px solid $gray-light
  box-shadow: $gray-light 0 0 5px

.dropdown__link
  display: block
  margin: 0 -20px
  padding: 5px 20px
  &:hover
    background-color: $gray-light


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.dropdown__input:focus ~ .dropdown__inner
  display: block
  transform-origin: top center
  animation:
    name: dropdown-inner
    duration: 300ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.dropdown__inner:hover
  display: block !important

@keyframes dropdown-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
    transform: rotateX(90deg)
  100%
    transform: rotateX(0)
    opacity: 1


// Demo wrapper
// --------------------------------------------------
.dropdown-demo
  margin: 0 0 150px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.live
  position: absolute
  top: -5px
  left: -5px
  width: 85px
  height: 85px
  overflow: hidden


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.live__container
  position: relative

.live__inner
  background-color: $red
  text-align: center
  text-transform: uppercase
  padding: 3px 0
  width: 120px
  left: -27px
  top: 21px
  position: relative
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  color: #fff
  transform: rotate(-45deg)
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px $gray-light
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: ''
    border-top: 4px solid $gray-base
    border-left: 4px solid transparent
    border-right: 4px solid transparent
    position: absolute
    bottom: -4px
  &:before
    left: 0
  &:after
    right: 0

sections.description: Animated modal popup with darkened overlay switched by pure CSS.
sections.markup:
Modal title
Modal content
sections.css:
$modal-width: 400px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
// .modal

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.modal__inner
  display: none
  position: fixed
  top: 30%
  width: $modal-width
  box-shadow: 0 5px 10px 0 lighten($gray-base, 30%)
  z-index: 101

.modal__title
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 10px 30px
  color: #fff
  text-align: center
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.modal__content
  background-color: #fff
  padding: 30px
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.modal__overlay
  display: none
  +overlay


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal__input:focus ~ .modal__inner
  display: block
  animation:
    name: modal-inner
    duration: 250ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards
.modal__input:focus ~ .modal__overlay
  display: block
  animation:
    name: modal-overlay
    duration: 250ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.modal__inner:hover
  &,
  & + .modal__overlay
    display: block !important


@keyframes modal-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

@keyframes modal-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

sections.description: Parallax effect written in pure CSS. Parallax is unique component. It should be used on layout abstraction level, as wrapper of whole content structure. Layer groups that contains backlayers must have lower z-index than default. It is achieved by using .parallax__group--with-baselayer modifier class. To display page properly, all layout elements, including header and footer, should be placed at least inside the .parallax div. You can even use it as a body class. Inspired by http://keithclark.co.uk/articles/pure-css-parallax-websites. Enable fullscreen preview to see a valid demonstration.

sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax
  height: 100vh
  overflow-x: hidden
  overflow-y: auto
  perspective: 300px
  perspective-origin-x: 100%

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax__group
  position: relative
  height: 100vh
  transform-style: preserve-3d
  z-index: 2

.parallax__baselayer,
.parallax__backlayer
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  bottom: 0
  left: 0
  transform-origin-x: 100%

.parallax__baselayer
  transform: translateZ(0)
  opacity: 0.9
  height: 100vh
  // Defining height is not necessary

.parallax__backlayer
  transform: translateZ(-300px) scale(2.01)
  // Use translateY to correct backlayer's vertical position


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax--debug
  .parallax__group
    transform: translate3d(700px, 0, -800px) rotateY(30deg)
  .parallax__baselayer,
  .parallax__backlayer
    border: 5px solid $gray-base

.parallax__group--with-backlayer
  z-index: 1


// Demo code below - can be removed on production site
.parallax_demo-title
  position: absolute
  text-align: center
  left: 0
  right: 0
  top: 50%
  font-size: 60px
  font-weight: bold
.parallax__demo-solid
  background-color: $brand-primary

sections.markup:
Popover title
Popover content
sections.css:
$popover-width: 230px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover
  position: relative
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.popover__inner
  position: absolute !important
  bottom: 100%
  left: 50%
  width: $popover-width
  margin: 0 0 25px -35px
  padding: 20px
  box-sizing: border-box
  display: none
  background-color: #fff
  border-radius: 7px
  text-align: left
  text-transform: none
  line-height: $line-height-computed
  color: $text-color
  z-index: 101
  box-shadow: $gray-lighter 2px 0 0
  +arrow($gray-lighter, #fff, "bottom", "out", 15px, 20px)

.popover__title
  font-size: 18px
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  margin-bottom: 12px

.popover__overlay
  display: none
  +overlay


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover--left
  .popover__inner
    margin-left: -$popover-width+35px
    &::before
      left: auto
      right: 20px
    &::after
      left: auto
      right: 19px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__input:focus ~ .popover__overlay
  display: block
  animation:
    name: popover-overlay
    duration: 500ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards
.popover__input:focus ~ .popover__inner
  display: block
  transform-origin: bottom left
  animation:
    name: popover-inner
    duration: 500ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.popover__inner:hover
  &,
  & + .popover__overlay
    display: block !important


@keyframes popover-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

@keyframes popover-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
    bottom: 25%
    transform: scale(0.05) rotate(30deg) rotateX(-90deg)
  50%
    transform: rotate(-10deg) rotateX(-2deg)
  70%
    transform: rotate(3deg)
    bottom: 100%
  100%
    opacity: 1
    transform: scale(1)


// Demo wrapper
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover-demo
  margin: 150px 0 20px
  text-align: center
sections.renderMarkup:
Popover title
Popover content

sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__legend
  height: 30px
  line-height: 30px
  display: inline-block
  float: left
  margin-right: 10px
.switch__label
  display: inline-block
  margin: 0
  cursor: pointer
  width: 60px
  height: 30px
  position: relative
  &:before
    // Coloured background.
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 100%
    height: 100%
    position: absolute
    background: $gray-lighter
    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
    transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out
    border-radius: 15px
  &:after
    // Dot.
    background: #fff
    height: 28px
    left: 1px
    top: 1px
    position: absolute
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out
    width: 30px
    border-radius: 50%
    // Inside dot.
    content: '|||'
    font-size: 10px
    text-align: center
    line-height: 27px
    text-indent: -1px
    color: $gray-lighter

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__input
  display: none !important
  &:checked
    & + label:before
      // Coloured background.
      background: $green
      opacity: 1
    & + label:after
      // Dot.
      left: 29px

sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.tabs
  position: relative
  &::after
    content: ""
    display: table
    clear: both

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.tabs__input
  // Visually hide radio buttons
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0
  display: none

.tabs__label
  display: block
  float: left
  cursor: pointer
  margin: 0
  background: $gray-base
  color: white
  padding: 5px 10px
  margin-right: 2px
  overflow: hidden

.tabs__content
  top: $line-height-computed + 10
  left: 0
  overflow: hidden
  width: 100%
  padding: 10px
  background: $gray-light
  opacity: 0
  display: none

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
// Open content when clicking label.
#tabs-toggle-1:checked ~ #tabs-content-1,
#tabs-toggle-2:checked ~ #tabs-content-2,
#tabs-toggle-3:checked ~ #tabs-content-3,
#tabs-toggle-4:checked ~ #tabs-content-4,
#tabs-toggle-5:checked ~ #tabs-content-5,
#tabs-toggle-6:checked ~ #tabs-content-6,
#tabs-toggle-7:checked ~ #tabs-content-7
  opacity: 1
  display: block

// Change styling of active label.
.tabs__input:checked + .tabs__label
  background-color: $gray-light

section.description: Minimalistic, fully hackable form framework.
section.css:
$form-item-width: 300px
$form-item-height: 40px
$form-item-margin: 30px
$form-item-font-size: $font-size-base
$form-item-bg: $gray-lighter

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.form


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__item
  margin: 0 0 $form-item-margin
  position: relative
  width: $form-item-width
  overflow: visible
  // Make form item full collumn width if is is composed in grid layout:
  *[class^="col-"] > &,
  *[class^="col-"] > .box > &
    min-width: auto


.form__label
  display: block
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-small
  text-transform: none
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold


.form__actions
  margin-top: $form-item-margin * 3
  button,
  input[type="button"],
  input[type="submit"]
    margin: 0


.form__input
  width: 100%
  margin: 0
  border: 2px solid transparent
  border-radius: 0
  height: $form-item-height
  line-height: $form-item-height - ($form-item-height/3)
  padding: $form-item-height/6 10px
  box-sizing: border-box
  font-size: $form-item-font-size
  transition: all 200ms ease-in
  background-color: $form-item-bg
  +placeholder($gray-light)
  &[type=file]
    line-height: $form-item-height * 0.45
textarea.form__input
  height: auto
select.form__input
  -webkit-appearance: none
  padding-right: 30px
  cursor: pointer
  // Custom caret:
  &:not([multiple])
    background:
      image: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 50%, $text-color 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, $text-color 50%, transparent 50%)
      position: calc(100% - 15px) $form-item-height/2-2px, calc(100% - 10px) $form-item-height/2-2px
      size: 5px 5px, 5px 5px
      repeat: no-repeat
  &[multiple]
    height: auto


.form__checkbox,
.form__radio
  display: block


.form__help
  position: absolute
  top: 100%
  display: block
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  line-height: $font-size-xsmall * 1.5
  color: lighten($text-color, 10%)


.form__addon
  position: absolute
  top: $line-height-computed
  right: $form-item-height / 3
  font-size: $form-item-font-size * 0.7
  line-height: $form-item-height


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__item--inline
  width: 100%
  .form__checkbox,
  .form__radio
    display: inline-block
    margin-right: 20px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__input:focus
  border: 2px solid $brand-primary
  box-shadow: none
  outline-width: 0


.form__item.is-success
  .form__label,
  .form__addon,
  .form__help
    color: darken($green, 5%)
  .form__input:not(:focus)
    border-color: lighten($green, 10%)
    // background-color: lighten($green, 53%)


.form__item.has-error
  .form__label,
  .form__addon,
  .form__help
    color: darken($red, 15%)
  .form__input:not(:focus)
    border-color: lighten($red, 15%)
    background-color: lighten($red, 53%)


//

.timeline__item,

  width: 70px

    left: -10px

  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 3

// Last item styling
.timeline__item:last-of-type

    border: none
  .timeline__description

    padding: 0

.timeline__item--past
  &, .timeline__title
    color: $gray-light

    background-color: $gray-light

section.description: Accordion switched by pure CSS basing on radio inputs, inspired by http://youmightnotneedjs.com/#tabs. Works with up to 7 elements.
section.markup:
Content for the first accordion

Content for the second accordion

Content for the third accordion
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
// .accordion

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.accordion__input
  // Visually hide radio buttons
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.accordion__label
  position: relative
  display: block
  cursor: pointer
  margin: 0 0 1px
  background: $gray-light
  color: white
  padding: 3px 40px 3px 10px
  overflow: hidden
  &::after
    content: '+'
    position: absolute
    display: block
    top: 0
    right: 0
    height: 100%
    width: 30px
    padding: 3px 0
    text-align: center
  &:checked
    content: '-'

.accordion__content
  height: 0
  opacity: 0
  transition: 500ms opacity ease-in-out

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
// Open content when clicking label.
#accordion-toggle-1:checked ~ #accordion-content-1,
#accordion-toggle-2:checked ~ #accordion-content-2,
#accordion-toggle-3:checked ~ #accordion-content-3,
#accordion-toggle-4:checked ~ #accordion-content-4,
#accordion-toggle-4:checked ~ #accordion-content-5,
#accordion-toggle-4:checked ~ #accordion-content-6,
#accordion-toggle-4:checked ~ #accordion-content-7
  height: auto
  opacity: 1
  padding: 20px 10px 0

// Change symbol on label.
.accordion__input:checked + .accordion__label
  &::after
    content: '-'

section.description: Button in various color and size versions.
section.markup: Button
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn
  background: transparent
  padding: 11px 25px
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  font-size: $font-size-base
  letter-spacing: 0.05em
  border: 2px solid
  border-radius: 30px
  white-space: nowrap
  cursor: pointer
  display: inline-block
  width: auto
  height: auto
  box-sizing: border-box
  +btn-color($text-color)
  &:hover, &:focus
    transition: color 250ms, border-color 250ms, background 250ms
    +btn-color(#fff, $text-color, $text-color)

button,
input[type="button"],
input[type="submit"]
  @extend .btn
  margin-top: 30px


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn--block
  width: 100%
  display: block
  max-width: none
  text-align: center

.btn--xs
  padding: 3px 10px 4px

.btn--sm
  padding: 7px 20px 9px

.btn--lg
  padding: 15px 35px
  border-radius: 30px

.btn--circle
  width: 48px
  height: 48px
  line-height: 48px
  padding: 0
  margin: -14px 0
  display: inline-block
  text-align: center
  border-radius: 50%
  +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color(#fff, $gray-base, $gray-base)

.btn--light
  +btn-color(#fff, #fff)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--primary
  +btn-color(#fff, $brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--link
  border: none
  padding-left: 0
  padding-right: 0
  +btn-color($brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    text-decoration: underline

.btn--disabled
  opacity: 0.15
  cursor: not-allowed
section.renderMarkup: Button

  canvas

  height: 60px

  left: 75px
  font-weight: 600
  line-height: 26px
  font-size: $font-size-base

  left: 75px
  top: 34px
  font-size: $font-size-small - 2
  br
    display: none

  .counter__pie

section.description: Dropdown menu switched by pure CSS. No jQuery.
section.markup: First dropdown link Second dropdown link Third dropdown link
section.css:
$dropdown-max-width: 230px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.dropdown
  position: relative
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.dropdown__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.dropdown__inner
  position: absolute !important
  top: 100%
  left: 0
  right: 0
  margin-top: 15px
  max-width: $dropdown-max-width
  padding: 5px 20px 10px
  display: none
  overflow: hidden
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  text-align: left
  text-transform: none
  line-height: $line-height-computed
  color: $text-color
  z-index: 101
  border: 1px solid $gray-light
  box-shadow: $gray-light 0 0 5px

.dropdown__link
  display: block
  margin: 0 -20px
  padding: 5px 20px
  &:hover
    background-color: $gray-light


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.dropdown__input:focus ~ .dropdown__inner
  display: block
  transform-origin: top center
  animation:
    name: dropdown-inner
    duration: 300ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.dropdown__inner:hover
  display: block !important

@keyframes dropdown-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
    transform: rotateX(90deg)
  100%
    transform: rotateX(0)
    opacity: 1


// Demo wrapper
// --------------------------------------------------
.dropdown-demo
  margin: 0 0 150px

section.description: Animated modal popup with darkened overlay switched by pure CSS.
section.markup:
Modal title
Modal content
section.css:
$modal-width: 400px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
// .modal

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.modal__inner
  display: none
  position: fixed
  top: 30%
  width: $modal-width
  box-shadow: 0 5px 10px 0 lighten($gray-base, 30%)
  z-index: 101

.modal__title
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 10px 30px
  color: #fff
  text-align: center
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.modal__content
  background-color: #fff
  padding: 30px
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.modal__overlay
  display: none
  +overlay


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal__input:focus ~ .modal__inner
  display: block
  animation:
    name: modal-inner
    duration: 250ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards
.modal__input:focus ~ .modal__overlay
  display: block
  animation:
    name: modal-overlay
    duration: 250ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.modal__inner:hover
  &,
  & + .modal__overlay
    display: block !important


@keyframes modal-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

@keyframes modal-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

Modal title
Modal content

section.description: Parallax effect written in pure CSS. Parallax is unique component. It should be used on layout abstraction level, as wrapper of whole content structure. Layer groups that contains backlayers must have lower z-index than default. It is achieved by using .parallax__group--with-baselayer modifier class. To display page properly, all layout elements, including header and footer, should be placed at least inside the .parallax div. You can even use it as a body class. Inspired by http://keithclark.co.uk/articles/pure-css-parallax-websites. Enable fullscreen preview to see a valid demonstration.

Back layer

section.markup:
Solid base layer
Transparent base layer
Back layer
Solid base layer
Solid base layer
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax
  height: 100vh
  overflow-x: hidden
  overflow-y: auto
  perspective: 300px
  perspective-origin-x: 100%

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax__group
  position: relative
  height: 100vh
  transform-style: preserve-3d
  z-index: 2

.parallax__baselayer,
.parallax__backlayer
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  bottom: 0
  left: 0
  transform-origin-x: 100%

.parallax__baselayer
  transform: translateZ(0)
  opacity: 0.9
  height: 100vh
  // Defining height is not necessary

.parallax__backlayer
  transform: translateZ(-300px) scale(2.01)
  // Use translateY to correct backlayer's vertical position


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax--debug
  .parallax__group
    transform: translate3d(700px, 0, -800px) rotateY(30deg)
  .parallax__baselayer,
  .parallax__backlayer
    border: 5px solid $gray-base

.parallax__group--with-backlayer
  z-index: 1


// Demo code below - can be removed on production site
.parallax_demo-title
  position: absolute
  text-align: center
  left: 0
  right: 0
  top: 50%
  font-size: 60px
  font-weight: bold
.parallax__demo-solid
  background-color: $brand-primary
section.renderMarkup:
Solid base layer
Transparent base layer
Back layer
Solid base layer

section.markup:
Popover title
Popover content
section.css:
$popover-width: 230px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover
  position: relative
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.popover__inner
  position: absolute !important
  bottom: 100%
  left: 50%
  width: $popover-width
  margin: 0 0 25px -35px
  padding: 20px
  box-sizing: border-box
  display: none
  background-color: #fff
  border-radius: 7px
  text-align: left
  text-transform: none
  line-height: $line-height-computed
  color: $text-color
  z-index: 101
  box-shadow: $gray-lighter 2px 0 0
  +arrow($gray-lighter, #fff, "bottom", "out", 15px, 20px)

.popover__title
  font-size: 18px
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  margin-bottom: 12px

.popover__overlay
  display: none
  +overlay


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover--left
  .popover__inner
    margin-left: -$popover-width+35px
    &::before
      left: auto
      right: 20px
    &::after
      left: auto
      right: 19px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__input:focus ~ .popover__overlay
  display: block
  animation:
    name: popover-overlay
    duration: 500ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards
.popover__input:focus ~ .popover__inner
  display: block
  transform-origin: bottom left
  animation:
    name: popover-inner
    duration: 500ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.popover__inner:hover
  &,
  & + .popover__overlay
    display: block !important


@keyframes popover-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

@keyframes popover-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
    bottom: 25%
    transform: scale(0.05) rotate(30deg) rotateX(-90deg)
  50%
    transform: rotate(-10deg) rotateX(-2deg)
  70%
    transform: rotate(3deg)
    bottom: 100%
  100%
    opacity: 1
    transform: scale(1)


// Demo wrapper
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover-demo
  margin: 150px 0 20px
  text-align: center
section.renderMarkup:
Popover title
Popover content

section.markup: Switch me
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__legend
  height: 30px
  line-height: 30px
  display: inline-block
  float: left
  margin-right: 10px
.switch__label
  display: inline-block
  margin: 0
  cursor: pointer
  width: 60px
  height: 30px
  position: relative
  &:before
    // Coloured background.
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 100%
    height: 100%
    position: absolute
    background: $gray-lighter
    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
    transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out
    border-radius: 15px
  &:after
    // Dot.
    background: #fff
    height: 28px
    left: 1px
    top: 1px
    position: absolute
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out
    width: 30px
    border-radius: 50%
    // Inside dot.
    content: '|||'
    font-size: 10px
    text-align: center
    line-height: 27px
    text-indent: -1px
    color: $gray-lighter

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__input
  display: none !important
  &:checked
    & + label:before
      // Coloured background.
      background: $green
      opacity: 1
    & + label:after
      // Dot.
      left: 29px
section.renderMarkup: Switch me

section.description: Tabs switched by pure CSS basing on radio inputs, inspired by http://youmightnotneedjs.com/#tabs. Works with up to 7 elements. If you want to use tabs just as a static elements, remove inputs and replace labels with standard divs.
section.markup:
Content for the first tab

Content for the second tab

Content for the third tab
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.tabs
  position: relative
  &::after
    content: ""
    display: table
    clear: both

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.tabs__input
  // Visually hide radio buttons
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0
  display: none

.tabs__label
  display: block
  float: left
  cursor: pointer
  margin: 0
  background: $gray-base
  color: white
  padding: 5px 10px
  margin-right: 2px
  overflow: hidden

.tabs__content
  top: $line-height-computed + 10
  left: 0
  overflow: hidden
  width: 100%
  padding: 10px
  background: $gray-light
  opacity: 0
  display: none

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
// Open content when clicking label.
#tabs-toggle-1:checked ~ #tabs-content-1,
#tabs-toggle-2:checked ~ #tabs-content-2,
#tabs-toggle-3:checked ~ #tabs-content-3,
#tabs-toggle-4:checked ~ #tabs-content-4,
#tabs-toggle-5:checked ~ #tabs-content-5,
#tabs-toggle-6:checked ~ #tabs-content-6,
#tabs-toggle-7:checked ~ #tabs-content-7
  opacity: 1
  display: block

// Change styling of active label.
.tabs__input:checked + .tabs__label
  background-color: $gray-light
